title: Margaret (TEFC)

description: Episode of Series "Social Security". A mentally handicapped child faces many problems. Margaret's parents are aware of her difficulties, and of the difficulties in the future when Margaret will be old enough to have to find a job and have boyfriends. One of a series originally created to introduce to the public the range of social services available from government and other agencies.
